originStory: Halawi, meaning 'sweet' in Arabic, lives up to its name. Grown in the Euphrates River valley of Iraq, these dates are known for their exceptional honey-like sweetness and soft, tender texture. The hot, arid climate concentrates natural sugars, creating dates with a distinctive golden-brown color and incredibly smooth, almost buttery mouthfeel.
tastingNotes: Intensely sweet with honey-like character, soft tender texture, golden-brown color, buttery smooth mouthfeel
bestUse: Perfect for those who prefer maximum natural sweetness, desserts, gift boxes - no added sugars needed, nature did it perfectly
whyWeCare: For customers who want maximum natural sweetness, Halawi delivers. The Euphrates terroir creates honey-like sweetness that no processing can replicate.
